subject: Soccer
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: For the second consecutive year, Manchester United proved to be the rude visitors, defeating the M.L.S. All-Star team, 4-0, before a sellout crowd of 26,760 at Red Bull Arena on Wednesday night.
snippet: For the second consecutive year, Manchester United proved to be the rude visitors, defeating the M.L.S. All-Star team, 4-0, before a sellout crowd of 26,760 at Red Bull Arena on Wednesday night.
